mapper.select: SELECT Z702DMTM.DEMO_TANA_NO AS DEMOTANANO, Z702DMTM.DEMO_TANA_DAN AS DEMOTANADAN, Z702DMTM.DEMO_TANA_SEQ AS DEMOTANASEQ, Z702DMTM.JAN_CD AS JANCD, M007KIJM.SHN_NM AS SHNNM, M007KIJM.KIKAKU_NM AS KIKAKUNM, M011TRIM.TRI_NM AS TRINM, Z009SHND.RRN_SU AS RRNSU, Z702DMTM.DEMO_SIJI_SU AS DEMOSIJISU, M009MSYM.BAIK AS BAIK, M009MSYM.GENK AS GENK FROM Z702DMTM INNER JOIN M007KIJM ON Z702DMTM.JAN_CD = M007KIJM.JAN_CD AND M007KIJM.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN M009MSYM ON Z702DMTM.JAN_CD = M009MSYM.JAN_CD AND M009MSYM.DELETE_FLG = '0' LEFT JOIN M011TRIM ON M009MSYM.TRI_CD = M011TRIM.TRI_CD AND M011TRIM.DELETE_FLG = '0' INNER JOIN Z009SHND ON Z702DMTM.JAN_CD = Z009SHND.SHN_CD AND Z009SHND.DELETE_FLG = '0' WHERE Z702DMTM.DELETE_FLG = '0' AND Z702DMTM.DEMO_TANA_NO = #{demoTanaCd}
